text: The fans know what's happened to me over the past couple of years. I lost my family. I pretty much got devastated financially and the fans know that I've had some hard times - and that's the nature of loyal fans. They want to see the people that they love and believe in get back on their feet.
author: Hulk Hogan

text: There were no temples or shrines among us save those of nature.
author: Charles Eastman

text: Nature says women are human beings, men have made religions to deny it. Nature says women are human beings, men cry out no!
author: Taslima Nasrin

text: There is no gardening without humility. Nature is constantly sending even its oldest scholars to the bottom of the class for some egregious blunder.
author: Alfred Austin

text: I found myself in a race with Mother Nature to play as much baseball as I could before she forced me to stop.
author: Willie Stargell
